description: While Covid-19 has strained healthcare systems around the world, the pandemic has shown that the value of healthcare professionals cannot be underestimated. What careers are available in healthcare beyond physicians and nurses? What skills are needed to be successful in this demanding industry? In this course we will explore the many complexities and facets of healthcare and see where you might fit in. Readings will focus on the essential skills for healthcare professionals: teamwork, resilience, and effective communication. Assignments will be varied and include an annotated bibliography, reflections on current issues in healthcare and large and small group discussions.
shortname: Top: Pulse of Careers in Healthcare
